meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1144.

td.p: Bob Drez, a teacher from Hattiesburg, Mississippi
Ouida Rellstab, a teacher from New Orleans, Louisiana
Jim Friguglietti, a college professor from Billings, Montana

tr.td: MYTHOLOGY
PROVERBS
THE ENVIRONMENT
ACTORS OF THE PAST
SING "OUT"
THE FIVE & DIME
